_header: Blind and deaf and also dumb
_description: Personal lines preceding Ayenbite of Inwyt

BLAru57.First Lines: Blind and dyaf and alsuo domb Of zeuenty yer al uol rondBe solle by draȝe to þe grond Vor peny uor mark ne uor pond
